name: Yomi
info: An ancient fox spirit. Former dungeon lord.

name: Ceri
info: An adventuring knight. Skilled with a blade and experienced in dungeon delving.

name: Charlotte
info: A patient shopkeeper and an importer of curios.

name: Isabella
info: A master of the needle and thread.

name: Sylvi
info: A well-read, albeit inexperienced, magician from the Elven Metropolis.

name: Maeve
info: One of the greatest heroes of the Human Cities and an unrivaled melee combatant.

name: Captain Bonny
info: A sea robber looking for steady employment.

name: Bunny
info: A girl with a cheerful, albeit fearful, dispositon. She can summon powerful winds.

name: Boar
info: Grumpy, stubborn and lacking in patience. Has a tendency to puff up her cheeks when angry.

name: Slime
info: Slow speaking, yet quite a formidable opponent.

name: Cat
info: A fickle, easily bored monster with a penchant for shiny objects.

name: Spear Warrior
info: A tired and bored guardsman, quite gifted with a spear.

name: Fox Tamer
info: The only master of an entire horde of small animals. She loves working with wildlife.

name: Witch
info: A monster who has delved into all kinds of arcane secrets.

name: Warrior
info: Valour and the glory of warfare. These are the things this monster strives for.

name: Sword Witch
info: Having studied both martial weaponry and magic, she is ready for any opponent.

name: Witch Bunny
info: While bunny girls are usually nice creatures, this rabbit is far from it.

name: Mud Girl
info: Despite being a placid monster, they are surprisingly effective at melee combat.

name: Tribeswoman
info: Despite her primitive trappings, this woman can easily stand toe-to-toe with any fighter.

name: Fox Archer
info: The bow is a powerful weapon when mastered, as this fox spirit knows very well.

name: Cat Witch
info: The fickle nature of a cat combined with the devastating magic of a witch.

name: Tiger
info: An exotic breed of cat monster from foreign lands, her strength and mercilessness strikes terror into her foes.

name: Monk
info: Having surrendered her possessions to pursue enlightenment, the only valuable thing this woman has now is her knowledge.

name: Panda
info: Fuzziness bestowed upon the most ill fitting creature it could be, the panda is far from docile.

name: Fox Miko
info: Monsters who turn to the heavens for guidance can end up like this miko, channeling divine magic and performing exorcisms.

name: Fox Knight
info: Fox spirits come in all shapes and sizes. This one chose to take up a blade and champion noble causes.

name: Forest Spirit
info: These spirits wander around the land and protect nature when she is suffering, bringing peace and serenity as they go.

name: Nine Tails
info: A ninetails is an arrogant fox spirit, but with good reason. Few can withstand the powerful magic this spirit can conjure.

name: Hammer
info: A warrior spirit who revels in senseless destruction. She does not care what she destroys, or who she fights.

name: Wand Witch
info: The most gifted of witches are granted a broom as a sign of their prowess. A witch on a broom is said to be an omen of disaster.

name: Genie
info: Born of mortal desire, genies remain trapped in their lamps until released by whoever rubs it. Whoever releases them commands their incredible power.

name: Assassin
info: A completely silent woman, the assassin uses mist to obscure her presence.

name: Abyssal Cow
info: Changed by the abyss and armed with a strange backpack, this cow girl is a dangerous monster.

name: Noblewoman
info: Arrogant, condescending and excessive, all of the hallmarks of decadent nobility.

name: Brawler
info: A warrior who makes use of two great gauntlets forged from steel. Her boxing style has been honed from years of battle.

name: Tribal Warrior
info: A head hunter from a foreign, primitive land seeking the ultimate hunt.

name: Abyssal Goat
info: Goats are not particularly bright. This goat is an exception. There are few who can compare to her intellectual capacity and mastery over magic.

name: Whip Wielder
info: Although she is a warrior spirit, her lust for battle has become a lust for something else.

name: Abyss Demon
info: Entities of the Abyss are collectively referred to as demons. Their forms vary, but all of them are terrifyingly powerful opponents. This one makes use of a bladed whip.

name: Abyss Mimic
info: Nothing is as it seems in the Abyss. These mimics can shape their environment around them, taking on forms which throw their opponents off guard.

name: Abyss Slime
info: Abyssal slimes are powerful casters which can easily channel energy through the translucent coating over their body.

name: Abyssal Watcher
info: This mysterious being acts like an enforcer for the abyssal gods. She has taken an interest in Yomi.

name: Spirit Guardian
info: A noble spirit bound to the land in order to protect its people. Those people are long gone, and thanks to Yomi, she now has her freedom.

name: Queen Bee
info: The ruler of the dungeon's hive, she enforces her rule with cunning and devastating might.

name: Chocolate Mimic
info: Docile, polite, yet incredibly lazy. Her chocolate is saturated with her excess mana.

name: Sand Sentinel
info: A sentinel made to protect a pocket dimension, she is highly curious about the world outside of where she came from.

name: Exalted Angel
info: An angelic being sent to guard a great treasure. Having failed that, she has joined forces with Yomi to watch over it.

name: Ryuuou
info: Ryuuous are one of the oldest monster species in existence. Due to their incredible strength, they are typically very bored and indifferent.

name: Tatsu
info: A servant who rarely leaves her master's side. She is more than eager to please.

name: Yori
info: Although she serves, she seems to be completely indifferent to it.

name: Ella
info: A reaper with little interest in her surroundings. She holds Emma dear to her heart.

name: Emma
info: A reaper who seems to enjoy her work a little bit too much. She holds Ella dear to her heart.

name: Anubis
info: The fickle guardian of the underworld. Her presence heralds disaster, as she follows cracks between this world and the Abyss.

name: Succubus
info: Succubi are great deceivers, fickle beings which can never be trusted. This one in particular seems to have a thing for ropes.

name: Vesta
info: A powerful dragon who has manipulated everything behind the scenes. Her plan was to exterminate humanity, only to be thwarted by Yomi's servants.

name: Izanami
info: A great calamity which has plagued this world since the beginning of time. Even the gods themselves cannot stop the passage of Izanami.

name: Infantry
info: The infantry of the invading fox army. They are armed with devastating plasma cutters and possess the finest training available in the galaxy.

name: Demolitionist
info: A heavy weapon specialist in the fox girl army. These spirits are trained to take down large or heavily armoured targets.

name: Commander
info: Many of these commanders can be seen spotted among the fox army, relaying orders and maintaining discipline.

name: Chika
info: An outlaw wanted in several solar systems, Chika will do anything she has to in order to save her own skin.

name: Hiriko
info: Hiriko, the surpreme commander of the invading fox girls. She is the only one on board to possess the Titan Weapon System, the most powerful weapon in the known galaxy.
